panels.title: Active Clients Count (Current Month) Time-Series Graph
Monthly Client Count Time-Series Graph (Reported Beginning of every Month)

list.description:
An RFC3339 timestamp or Unix epoch time. Specifies the end of the period for which client counts will be reported. 
Example:  2024-12-31T11:59:59Z
list.label: End Time
list.name: end_time

list.description:
An RFC3339 timestamp or Unix epoch time. Specifies the start of the period for which client counts will be reported. 
Example:  2024-01-01T00:00:00Z
list.label: Start Time
list.name: start_time
